message_thread.content:
1. Based on the extracted data from {'Course Information': {'Course Title': 'Basic Urban Farming with Hydroponics', 'Name of Organisation': 'Tertiary Infotech Pte. Ltd.', 'Classroom Hours': 5, 'Number of Assessment Hours': 1, 'Course Duration (Number of Hours)': 8, 'Industry': 'Agriculture'}, 'Learning Outcomes': {'Learning Outcomes': ['LO1: Perform farming activities and equipment operations according to standard operating procedures.', 'LO2: Execute farming operations work in accordance with regulations, WSH practices and housekeeping rules.'], 'Knowledge': ['K1: Types, purpose and functions of farming equipment and machinery', 'K2: Farming operation Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs)', 'K3: Good Agriculture Practices (GAPs), prevailing regulations on food safety and Workplace Safety and Health (WSH) practices', 'K4: Equipment cleaning and maintenance techniques'], 'Ability': ['A1: Prepare farming materials, equipment and machinery for daily operation', 'A2: Perform farming activities in accordance with standard operating procedures to meet production schedule and targets', 'A3: Execute farming operations work in compliance with prevailing regulations on agricultural practices and food safety standards, and WSH practices', 'A4: Perform housekeeping of farm premises, cleaning of workstations, farming equipment, machinery and tools'], 'Knowledge and Ability Mapping': {'KA1': ['A1', 'K1'], 'KA2': ['A2', 'K2'], 'KA3': ['A3', 'K3'], 'KA4': ['A4', 'K4']}}, 'TSC and Topics': {'TSC Title': ['Urban Farming Implementation and Management Control'], 'TSC Code': ['AGR-FOP-2002-1.1'], 'Topics': ['Topic 1: Introduction to Hydroponics and Systems (A1, K1)', 'Topic 2: Growing Media, Plant Nutrition, and Practical Application (A2, K2)', 'Topic 3: Basic Techniques of Hydroponics Farming (A3, K3)', 'Topic 4: Urban Farming Practices in Singapore (A4, K4)'], 'Learning Units': ['LU1: Overview of Hydroponics', 'LU2: Understanding Plant Nutrition', 'LU3: Techniques in Hydroponics', 'LU4: Practices in Urban Farming']}, 'Assessment Methods': {'Assessment Methods': ['Written Assessment', 'Oral Questioning'], 'Amount of Practice Hours': '2', 'Course Outline': {'Learning Units': {'LU1': {'Description': [{'Topic': 'Topic 1: Introduction to Hydroponics and Systems (A1, K1)', 'Details': ['Definition and history of hydroponics', 'Advantages and disadvantages of hydroponics', 'Basic components of a hydroponic system', 'Different types of hydroponic systems (e.g., NFT, DWC, Ebb and Flow)', 'Selecting the right system for specific crops', 'Setting up and maintaining hydroponic systems']}]}, 'LU2': {'Description': [{'Topic': 'Topic 2: Growing Media, Plant Nutrition, and Practical Application (A2, K2)', 'Details': ['Types of growing media used in hydroponics', 'Nutrient solutions and their preparation', 'Monitoring and adjusting pH and EC levels', 'Assembling a basic hydroponic system', 'Planting and caring for crops in a hydroponic system', 'Maintenance and troubleshooting of hydroponic setups']}]}, 'LU3': {'Description': [{'Topic': 'Topic 3: Basic Techniques of Hydroponics Farming (A3, K3)', 'Details': ['Principles of indoor farming', 'Lighting, temperature, and humidity control', 'Integration of hydroponics into indoor farming setups', 'Guided hydroponics farm tour at Kok Fah Farm', 'Real-world application of hydroponic techniques', 'Observation of commercial hydroponic operations', 'Understanding farm management and maintenance practices']}]}, 'LU4': {'Description': [{'Topic': 'Topic 4: Urban Farming Practices in Singapore (A4, K4)', 'Details': ['Basics of aquaponics and its benefits', 'Setting up an aquaponics system', 'Regulatory considerations and best practices for urban farming in Singapore', 'Performing farming activities in compliance with prevailing regulations', 'Good Agriculture Practices (GAPs) and Workplace Safety and Health (WSH) practices', 'Equipment cleaning and maintenance techniques']}]}}}, 'Instructional Methods': ['Lecture', 'Didactic Questioning', 'Demonstration']}}, generate your justifications.
    2. Ensure your responses are structured in JSON format.
    3. Return a full JSON object with all your answers according to the schema.
